meanings.definition: A small bus used for transporting passengers on a regular route.
meanings.sent1: The minibusses arrived at the bus stop to pick up the passengers.
meanings.sent2: I took the minibusses to work every day.
meanings.sent3: The minibusses decided to have a race to see who could reach the next stop first.
meanings.sent4: The minibusses lined up like obedient children waiting for their turn.
meanings.sent5: The bright yellow minibusses stood out against the gray city backdrop.

meanings.definition: The plural form of the word 'minibus'.
meanings.sent1: There were many minibusses parked outside the terminal.
meanings.sent2: The minibusses were all in good condition and ready to go.
meanings.sent3: The minibusses gathered for a group photo, looking like a fleet of toy cars.
meanings.sent4: The minibusses filled the parking lot, creating a colorful mosaic.
meanings.sent5: The sound of the minibusses starting their engines echoed through the street.
